programme.title: Pavitra Rishta
programme.desc: Garage owner Manav is smitten with Archana, a homely, hardworking middle class woman. When they marry, a series of crises threaten Manav's happiness.

programme.title: Doosari Maa
programme.desc: Yashoda deals with her husband's past transgressions, torn between the anguish of a wronged wife and heartfelt compassion for the plight of Krishna, her stepson, who lost his mother and is struggling for acceptance.
